name: Crystalline (itch) (Vishcorp Games)
description:
This demo contains some levels to introduce the idea behind the game

"Time is relative"
                                                                    

How will you survive in a holographic simulated world where time is a variable?

And everything wants you dead?

  Will you be able to decide your fate with your shotgun?

Please look at the controls before proceeding.

CONTROLS:

  • 'W','A','S','D' :- To Move.
  • 'SPACE' :- To Jump.
  • 'MOUSE' :- To Look Around.
  • 'RIGHT CLICK (MOUSE)' :- To Shoot.
  • 'E' :- To interact (Pick up gun).
